attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to the public,have displays by councils etc; at organised events.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In this day and age its time to put a stop to death and injury caused by fireworks in the public domain . The threat of terror attacks should also be of concern if people stockpile fireworks who knows what could be made from large quantities.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
